results.content: I have trained with this instructor before, and I feel he does a wonderful job. Yes he maybe mundane for experienced coders, but for us beginners he's the correct ticket. He takes his time and explains everything, he purposely makes mistakes, to show us how to correct them. Before we freak out and give up. This is exactly what you need in a teacher in the beginning of any course. We already doubt ourselves, so we need to know and see, even veterans can have an off day. To teach us how to chalk it up to just that and keep plugging away at it. I very much enjoy learning with this instructor. He takes his time and explains everything always. Money well spent. I didn't take the course to get left behind , give up and quit. I took it to learn something. I get that with this instructor. So I'm very happy with my purchase of this course. And I will study with him again. I feel I can learn from him.

results.content: A very good course for beginners.

The teaching is around building a app, and was a great start.  More discussion about supporting documentation, and the logical structure of the  node would be nice.
I found it was a good way to get started and create something to develop and research around.

results.content: Great tutorial. The pace was a bit slow but perhaps a good speed for complete beginners. The challenges are also appropriate. It would have been nice to include downloads of the lesson codes for comparison. Thanks for a great course!

results.content: I felt his lectures could have gone by faster. He spoke really slow, which annoyed me a bit. Otherwise he really knows what he's doing.
